might aswell just play wow

item.title: New Lighting
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:12, topic:539409”]If they are going to keep upgrading runescape would it eventually stop being a web browser game and actually make it download-able?[/quote]They will never move the game completely from the browser.

item.title: New Lighting
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:8, topic:539409”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=658242.msg4403044#msg4403044 date=1391119812]
The last one looks weird. I like the rest of them though, nice job.
[/quote]

But he didn’t make them its from the official RS? …right?[/quote]Pulled right from the official Twitter. Apparently this could be coming within as little as 2 months.

Read full topic

item.title: New Lighting
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:9, topic:539409”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=658242.msg4403081#msg4403081 date=1391122576]

Still looks like crap to me. Compared to what other games have now.

Seems that you just don’t like RuneScape in general. So why even post if you’re just going to say negative stuff about the graphics when clearly, they are pretty good. Everyone who hates on RuneScape, always compares them to other games. Not everything has to be like other games.
[/quote]

If I didn’t like RuneScape I wouldn’t be recreating the game. I don’t like their “HD” graphics is all. I’ve played many free games with better graphics then that. I feel if they are charging people they can do way better. I am just giving my input. I am sorry if you don’t like it.[/quote]
The graphics are for everyone who plays. It’s the content that is different for members and f2p.

Read full topic

Still looks like crap to me. Compared to what other games have now.

Seems that you just don’t like RuneScape in general. So why even post if you’re just going to say negative stuff about the graphics when clearly, they are pretty good. Everyone who hates on RuneScape, always compares them to other games. Not everything has to be like other games.[/quote]

If I didn’t like RuneScape I wouldn’t be recreating the game. I don’t like their “HD” graphics is all. I’ve played many free games with better graphics then that. I feel if they are charging people they can do way better. I am just giving my input. I am sorry if you don’t like it.

Read full topic
